text: Richard John Colangelo (April 14, 1957DOB according to Jeni's Website and Social Security Death Index. - March 10, 2007), better known as Richard Jeni, was an American stand-up comedian and actor. He was known for his role in The Mask and in Platypus Man. He was born in Brooklyn, New York City. Jeni committed suicide by shooting himself at his Los Angeles, California after suffering from depression for two months."Family Says Jeni Committed Suicide." Associated Press via Washington Post. March 13, 2007. Retrieved on March 13, 2007. He was 49 years old. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:1957 births Category:2007 deaths Category:Actors who committed suicide Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Comedians from New York City Category:Comedians who committed suicide Category:Suicides by firearm in the United States
title: Richard Jeni
